title: Calories in a Russet Potato
meta_description: Learn calories in a russet potato with full nutrition facts for one medium baked serving, including carbs, protein, fiber, and preparation tweaks.
assumptions: Medium size (173 g), baked with skin, no added fats, salt, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato size, variety, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check sources or labels for precision.

quick_answer.text: One medium baked russet potato provides ~168 kcal, mostly from complex carbs.

basis.label: per 1 medium russet potato (173 g, baked with skin)

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a russet potato?
faqs.a: About 168 kcal for one medium baked russet potato with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a russet potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 37.7 g total carbs, including 3.4 g fiber, per medium serving.

faqs.q: Is a russet potato high in protein?
faqs.a: No, it has about 4.6 g protein per medium potatoâ€”it's primarily a carb source.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a russet potato?
faqs.a: Baking with skin keeps calories low; frying or adding fats like oil/butter increases them significantly.

faqs.q: What size is a medium russet potato?
faqs.a: Typically 173 g with skin; smaller or larger potatoes will adjust calorie totals proportionally.
